dispositivi_per_la_purificazione_dell_ar.availability: Available in selected markets from the fourth quarter
use_cases: Alternative to low-quality DIY masks and hard-to-find disposable masks
solutions: Utilizes two H13 HEPA filters similar to those used in LG's home air purification products
Equipped with dual fans and patented respiratory sensor for adjusting fan speed based on breathing cycle and volume
Ergonomically designed to fit the face shape and minimize air leakage
Comes with a lightweight 820mAh battery providing up to 8 hours of operation in low mode and 2 hours in high mode
Includes a case with UV LED lights for germ elimination, filter replacement notification via LG ThinQ mobile app

key_features.respiratory sensor: Patented sensor for adjusting fan speed based on breathing
key_features.battery: 820mAh battery providing up to 8 hours of operation
key_features.case: Includes a case with UV LED lights for germ elimination and filter replacement notification

dispositivi_per_la_purificazione_dell_ar.call_to_action: Learn more about the availability and functionality of the PuriCare Wearable Air Purifier
